hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #4# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Nayru's Love# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Heart Container#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Lobby Basement Lower

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that at the #bottom of Zora's Fountain# lies #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that in the #depths of the well# a spider and a chest hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ GS Basement
Bottom of the Well MQ Lens of Truth Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the Lizalfos in Dodongo's Cavern like to play in lava.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: While you're wasting time reading this hint, the others are playing the seed.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of the Water Temple# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #time#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: KF GS Know It All House
